column2: With cobbled agates were its streets a glory.
column3: With cobbled agates were its streets a glory.

column2: Through small square panes of rose-quartz the citizens looked from their houses.
column3: Through small square panes of rose quartz the citizens looked from their houses.

column2: To them as they looked abroad the World far-off seemed happy.
column3: To them as they looked abroad the World far off seemed happy.
